name: The Big Green Clean
description:
You are Hugh Mann, a goblin independent contractor that is often misunderstood, who must navigate and restore a tower that his client has recently purchased. Use traditional platformer mechanics (WASD to move, Space to jump, F to interact and advance dialogue) in order to progress the narrative.

Made over the course of 5 weeks for ARTG and CMPM 120 at University of California, Santa Cruz.
